channel.title: apple on tact.moe
channel.description: Recent content in apple on tact.moe

item.title: Apple M1 Macbook Air
item.description: So I’ve had an M1 powered MacBook Air, my first Mac, for close to over a month now. And it’s been a life changing experience.

item.title: Setting Custom Ringtones on iPhone
item.description: If you have an iPhone and want to set a custom ringtone, there are a few ways to accomplish this, none of them however are logical or sane. The method outlined here also works on iPad, iPod Touch or any other iOS device and should apply to anything running iOS 12 through to 14 or later.

item.title: Apple Silicon
item.description: At WWDC 2020, Apple announced the transition of the Mac from Intel processors to to their own “Apple Silicon” processors, the same kind as the ARM based chips that power the iPhone and iPad. They also commited to shipping their first Mac with these chips before the end of 2020 and said that they intend the transition to last two years.
